overview.en: XiaMiPool is user-centric, providing a stable, fair and open business platform for crypto asset holders, providing users with multi-dimensional technical services such as project governance, node voting, node custody, wallet services, financial management, etc.
overview.zh: 虾米矿池是以用户为中心，为数字资产持有者提供稳定、安全、公平、公开的业务平台，为用户提供项目治理，节点投票，节点托管，钱包服务，金融理财等多维度技术服务
